level.heading: EXCEPTIONS TO THE SCHEDULE OF REQUIREMENTS[COLON] NEAR METRORAIL STATIONS (ยง1-2104)

level.text: The number of parking spaces required for a nonresidential building or structure shall be seventy-five percent (75%) of the amount otherwise ordinarily required under ยง 2101.1 if the building is located within a radius of eight hundred feet (800 ft.) of a Metrorail station entrance and:
The building or structure is located in a nonresidential district and is at least eight hundred feet (800 ft.) from any R-1, R-2, R-3, or R-4 District; and
The Metrorail station is currently in operation or is one for which a construction contract has been awarded.
